imagingbook.pub.regions

Class RegionLabeling

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.regions.RegionLabeling
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BreadthFirstLabeling, DepthFirstLabeling, RecursiveLabeling, RegionContourLabeling, SequentialLabeling

    public abstract class RegionLabeling
extends Object
    This class does the complete region labeling for a given image. It is abstract, because the implementation of some parts depends on the region labeling algorithm being used.
    Version:
    2018/04/01

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion
      This class of RegionLabeling represents a connected component or binary region.

      • getRegions

        public List<RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion> getRegions()
        Get an unsorted list of all regions associated with this region labeling.
        Returns:
        the list of regions.

      • getRegions

        public List<RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion> getRegions(boolean sort)
        Get a possibly sorted list of all regions associated with this region labeling.
        Parameters:
        sort - set true to sort regions by decreasing size.
        Returns:
        the list of regions.

      • getLabel

        public int getLabel(int u,
                    int v)
        Get the label number for the specified image coordinate.
        Parameters:
        u - the horizontal coordinate.
        v - the vertical coordinate.
        Returns:
        the label number for the given position.

      • makeLabelImage

        public ij.process.ImageProcessor makeLabelImage(boolean color)
        Utility method that creates an image of the internal label array.
        Parameters:
        color - set false to get a 16-bit grayscale image, true for an RGB (24-bit) color image.
        Returns:
        an image of the label array.

      • findRegion

        public RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion findRegion(int label)
        Find the region associated to the given label.
        Parameters:
        label - the label number.
        Returns:
        the region object associated with the given label or null if it does not exist.

      • getRegion

        public RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion getRegion(int u,
                                             int v)
        Finds the RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion instance associated with the given image position.
        Parameters:
        u - the horizontal position.
        v - the vertical position.
        Returns:
        The associated RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion object or null if this RegionLabeling has no region at the given position.

      • makeRandomColor

        protected int makeRandomColor()

      • getRegionPoints

        public Iterable<Point> getRegionPoints(RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion r)
        Deprecated. This method is not supported any longer. Instead use Iterable<Point> capability of RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion to iterate directly over region points.
        Parameters:
        r - the binary region.
        Returns:
        an Iterable to iterate over all region points.
